title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing a dream about the heart in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a heart in a dream? The heart is the organ responsible for pumping blood to all parts of the body, and blood carries food and oxygen to all cells. Its development is complete approximately eight weeks after conception. Perhaps seeing the heart in a dream is one of the most important visions that we receive, so what does this vision mean?! Heart in a dream The heart is the source of faith and the essence of religiosity, and based on this some interpreters went to different connotations in which they explained the meaning of seeing it in a dream, and these connotations are: The first evidence is summarized in Three points: The dreamer is characterized by good morals, generosity, and good solidarity. Seeing a beating heart is a sign of a heart full of faith, passion, and kindness. The second evidence is summarized in two points: courage, adventure, and lack of hesitation in implementing some decisions that end the dreamer’s life or make it better. The heart is the first warrior before the mind. It stands in the way of many ideas, and most often the heart wins and takes precedence, and through it a person derives the courage that gives him the strength to impose his opinion. And a sound vision in many future matters. Continuous sacrifice and not expecting a return, the dreamer does not want to get what he would like to offer and help the needy. He may be the most needy person, but he does not reveal himself or hide and gives everything he has. The third sign can be summarized as follows: Compassion and kindness in dealing with people and not hurting them with words and fear of their feelings. Intelligence and acceptance of work that requires effort and at the same time contains A kind of adventure that adds excitement to work and not giving up. Good religion, morals, and willingness to do good for people. Life, vitality, peace of mind, completing work without mistakes and with great passion, and performing religious duties with love and reverence. Spirituality and curiosity about the other world. Interpretation of seeing a heart in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin went Sirin has many interpretations of his interpretation of the heart, and his interpretations vary according to the condition of the heart. Ibn Sirin says: The heart generally symbolizes courage and generosity. If the heart is white in a dream, it means purity, many acts of obedience, and lack of propaganda in charitable works. A sick heart indicates corruption, change in color, evil, failure to reveal the truth, and hypocrisy. And do evil. A sick heart in a dream does not necessarily mean that the dreamer has a disease that he suffers from in his life as much as it means that the dreamer has neglected to repair his heart, which contains grudges, sins, and distance. From God. A painful heart symbolizes fatigue from doing what God has forbidden, the inability to return to it, and disappointment in choosing a path other than what God commanded him to do. If people describe a brave man as holding his heart in his hand, then the dreamer’s vision is that he is holding his heart in His hand is a sign of dangers and dangers. The heart symbolizes religion and the mind symbolizes the mind. The heartbeat indicates recovery if the dreamer is sick and the cessation of worry if he is sad. If the heart has an eye in a dream, this is a sign of intelligence, insight, and the ability to know certain aspects of life.

preview.html: And when you see it in a dream, in most cases it symbolizes good, and rarely symbolizes evil. In our article we talk about seeing snow in a dream and the different cases of this vision. Seeing snow in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most famous dream interpreters and his books have filled the world. We mention Some of what he interpreted in his dream about seeing snow and falling in the dream is as follows: Seeing snow falling from the sky in winter is evidence of relief from anxiety and the disappearance of hatred and kindness from the dreamer. Sometimes seeing snow in a dream shows the power of the Sultan and his control over the people. Small snow indicates A man's dream refers to growth and fertility and may indicate that goodness comes from afar on the way to the journey. Also, seeing in a dream sleeping on snow is a sign of the torment that the person will experience in his life. Dreaming of buying white snow is a sign of quickly gaining water, comfort and sadness. Falling Snow on green plants is a sign of blessing and prosperity. And for a person to see snow falling while he is in a distant country means that he will be subjected to painful torture. Seeing snow in a dream for a single woman Snow in a person’s dream has many different meanings that can be interpreted as follows: When a single woman sees white snow in her dream, This is a sign that she achieves her various goals in life. She quickly achieves what she dreams of and what she aspires to. When an unmarried woman sees white snow in her dream, this is evidence of her marriage or engagement. And that the applicant must have morals. White snow in a dream indicates happiness. The greatness that a person enjoys. Also, seeing a single girl playing in the snow is a wonderful sign. The instability of her family life. The feeling of sadness, anxiety, and her poor psychological state. Snowfall in anyone’s dream indicates the enormous wealth that this person will obtain after a lot of patience. The dream of running amidst heavy snowfall indicates psychological instability. The family and social conflicts that fill her life. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of a dream about heavy rain for single women. Seeing snow in a dream for a married woman. We come to see a married woman snowing in her dream, and this means many things, including: When a woman sees A married woman sees snow in a dream. This is a sign that she feels safe and happy with her children. It is also an indication of the stability of family life. Seeing snow in a married woman’s dream also indicates a good life and good people around her. It has an indication of her good qualities and good morals. And the dream that she sees For a married woman in her dream that she is playing in the snow is an indication of the many problems that fill her life and her success in getting rid of them. Likewise, snow falling from the sky and landing on a married woman is evidence of the goodness that she is blessed with. This may indicate that she will become pregnant soon and have fair means of living with children. It indicates Seeing snow in a dream for a married woman indicates her recovery from a disease she was suffering from. Seeing snow in a dream for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman is one of those people who, if she dreams of seeing snow falling from the sky, it means...

title: Interpretation of milk in a dream for a married woman by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Milk in a dream for a married woman. This dream is interpreted according to the life of the married woman and her social status, as its interpretation can have connotations of good and ultimately evil, as each description of it differs from the other.Milk in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about milk for a married woman from visions that carry many Elements that indicate abundant nutrition and the removal of obstacles and difficult problems that pass. When a woman sees that milk is coming from her breast, this is good news of the pregnancy of one of her married daughters. The dreamer in her dream of distributing milk is nothing but good news and doing many good deeds. In the event that she buys milk, this indicates The prestigious position enjoyed by the fortune-teller and her constant superiority in decision-making. Also, seeing milk in the dreamer’s dream indicates that she is an intelligent woman who is always thinking about managing the affairs of her home and treating her husband and children in an appropriate manner. Milk in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin sees in the interpretation of a vision Milk for a married woman who has not given birth is the good news that pregnancy is imminent and she will have good offspring. According to his opinion, milk in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the existence of an inheritance and material gains from some of her work. Milk in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer has a good heart and that she has beautiful and strong feelings that she gives. For everyone who deals with her. Ibn Sirin believes that if the dreamer sees that she is buying milk, this indicates the stability of her circumstances and the absence of disputes and problems. If a woman sees in her dream that she is drinking milk, this means sincere repentance to God and continuous forgiveness for the sake of forgiveness. When a married woman drinks Milk with her husband, this is good news and she will collect a lot of money and benefits that God will give her with it. Milk in a dream for a pregnant woman. For a pregnant woman to see milk in her dream is a good sign of happiness and satisfaction with her husband and the quiet life she enjoys. And a married woman’s dream of milk, and a delayed Her pregnancy is evidence that her pregnancy is approaching, and that she is blessed with patience and nourishment from good offspring. Also, pure milk in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates her closeness to God, good deeds, and facing life’s difficulties with patience. There is evidence that seeing a pregnant married woman with milk in a dream is A sign of feeding a safe and healthy child. If the dreamer sees spilled milk in a dream, this is an unpleasant vision that indicates a miscarriage of the fetus and she must be careful. Seeing drinking milk in a dream is for a married woman. Seeing drinking milk in a married woman’s dream is a harbinger of the abundance of good and great profits that her husband will reap. In his life. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is eating milk, this is one of the omens that will lead to nutrition in terms of fair children. Also, to see yourself drinking milk in a dream is generally a sign of many good things, profits and gains that you will receive. Interpretation Curd in a dream for a married woman. Interpreters talk about a married woman’s dream with milk in her dream, which indicates happiness and great joy after hardships and many hardships.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing makeup in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see makeup in a dream across moments, according to scholars and senior Arab translators, is one of the dreams that makes people feel confused and anxious. The meaning of seeing makeup in a dream: The makeup of a woman, man, single, pregnant, or divorced woman in a dream has meanings in our real lives. Interpretation of a dream about seeing makeup by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing makeup as a desire to improve one’s true image. Also, seeing makeup in a dream indicates a desire The dreamer enhances self-confidence. Seeing the purchase of expensive makeup at high prices means the beginning of a new luxurious life and improving financial conditions. As for seeing makeup, but in an exaggerated form, it is evidence of interest in only the external appearance. Seeing kohl, which is a type of cosmetics, is evidence On insightful insight. Buying makeup in a dream is a good vision for women in general. The dreamer seeing that the face is full of makeup in a very exaggerated way means that he treats those around him in a bad way and does not behave well. Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a man: Seeing a man as if he is wearing makeup in a dream is evidence On his appetite that a certain thing people will not see. Seeing a man who works as a manager, in reality, wearing makeup, but in an exaggerated way, is evidence that he treats workers with violence and violence. Seeing a man wearing makeup in a dream means that he suffers from mental illnesses that he wants to eliminate Likewise, makeup in a man’s dream on his face is evidence of good behavior and good morals. Makeup is also evidence of deception and lying in reality. Seeing makeup in a dream is evidence of a man’s separation from his wife. Makeup in a dream indicates sadness in a man’s life, because makeup changes The color of the face in reality. As for removing, wiping and getting rid of makeup, it is final and a symbol of liberation from damage and misery. An unmarried young man who sees himself wearing makeup in a dream indicates marriage or engagement, this is soon. Interpretation of dreams of makeup for single women Seeing single women using makeup in a dream is A sign of appreciation for new things with others. As for an unmarried woman who sees in her dream that her makeup has made her ugly, this is evidence of deceiving people, meaning that she is speaking about something other than what is in her heart, which is extreme hypocrisy. Seeing a single girl buying makeup tools in a dream indicates On her sense of beauty, full of vitality, energy and a lot of confidence in her abilities. Seeing single women buying makeup is evidence of marriage to a very wealthy man. Buying makeup is also evidence that you will have a lot of money and good things. Likewise, a single woman who sees herself as If she wears makeup, it indicates that she is jealous of her friends and jealous of them. As for an unmarried woman who wears makeup, but in a large amount in the dream, it is a sign that she feels a loss of interest in those around her. Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman wearing makeup in a dream is nothing but Evidence that she feels confused and stressed as a result of the pregnancy. As for the percentages

title: A detailed interpretation of the name Ibrahim in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the name Ibrahim in a dream in detail. Many of us dream and see in our dreams many details that can happen in life and see them in a dream, but when you saw the name Ibrahim in a dream, this has a different meaning. Interpretation of what I saw of things and there are other names, and each name that appears in a dream has different interpretations and meanings according to the situation or feeling that the fortuneteller touches in the dream, so today we will learn together in this article the interpretation of the name Ibrahim in a dream in detail. Interpretation of the name Ibrahim in a dream when he is single, and if he sees in His dream is an unmarried woman named Ibrahim. This is evidence of goodness and blessing in this girl’s life. God creates conditions for her so she can live in peace and tranquility. But if an unmarried woman sees in her dream a man named Ibrahim. If she knows him, God will help her marry this man, even if she does not know him. This is evidence that Almighty God will decree a pilgrimage for her to the Holy House of God. Because Abraham and Ishmael, peace be upon them, were the first to build the Holy Kaaba. And if she sees in her dream that the name of Abraham follows her everywhere, this is evidence that there is a man named Abraham who wants to interfere with her in every possible way, and takes every means to do so, but he cannot. reach it. It is forbidden and it was said: Seeing the name Ibrahim in a dream is a sign of freedom from life’s problems and difficulties. God Almighty, like Ishmael, peace be upon him, saved him from slaughter and ransomed him with a ram. This is an indication that this girl will be saved from any trouble or problem that will occur in her life, just like seeing the name of Abraham in a dream. Evidence of marrying a good and righteous man. She fears God Almighty in secret and in public, and is not afraid to accuse the sinner for the sake of God, and this woman will be happy. Interpretation of seeing the name Abraham for a married woman: And if a married woman sees the name Abraham in a dream, this is evidence that God Almighty gives this woman goodness and grace in her life, and God bless her. In her life, her children, and her husband, and God blessed them with a lot. A happy and stable married life, as well as if a married woman sees the name Ibrahim in a dream. This is evidence that God Almighty will make her perform Hajj to the Sacred House of God. Because this is good news. Abraham and Ishmael were the first to build the Kaaba, and they took care of it, and this is evidence that God Almighty will save her from all the hardships of her married life. The name Abraham suggests that she will be saved from the evils invented by her friends. This is evidence that there is a man pursuing her in her life, and she cannot get rid of him for fear of her marital life. Interpretation of seeing the name Ibrahim in a dream while you are pregnant, and if a pregnant woman sees the name Ibrahim in her dream. This is evidence that God Almighty will save this woman and provide security for her and her fetus. It is evidence that God guides this woman’s children, and writes for them a bright future in their academic and professional lives, and this, if necessary, indicates righteousness to parents. Because the best of children is the best of fathers. In conclusion, Jan mentions the name of Abraham, which is one of the names that has great value in religion and the world because it is one of the names of the prophets and has a great status.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing all colors in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing all colors in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing all colors in a dream means achieving goals, success, and excellence. Also, seeing all colors in a dream shows self-development and a desire for new things to happen, and a lot of halal money will be saved. Seeing all colors In a dream, the colors of the spectrum indicate the fulfillment of desires, wishes, and goals, and this indicates the collapse of worries and sorrows. Interpretation of seeing all the colors in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she sees many colors in a dream, this indicates the collapse of her worries and the achievement of her hopes and desired goals. Seeing the colors of the spectrum or multiple colors of the spectrum in a dream indicates a short marriage and her marriage contract with a righteous man of high status. Seeing all colors in a dream indicates excellence and success in her academic and professional life, and her elevation, not her status, and God knows best. Seeing a lot of colorful clothes in The dream indicates the collapse of worries, the achievement of goals, and faith in God, and it also indicates adherence to religion. Interpretation of seeing all colors in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she sees many bright colors, this indicates achieving goals and achieving desired ambitions. Also, seeing many colors In the dream, it indicates that she will soon become pregnant with good offspring, and that her husband will enter a new job, and God knows best. This vision also indicates the collapse of the disputes that arise between her and her husband, and also indicates the alleviation of the difficult problems she faces. Interpretation of seeing all colors in a dream for a pregnant woman to see If a pregnant woman sees many colors in her dream, this means that she has been cured of all diseases and that her birth will go smoothly, and God knows best. This vision also shows that her due date is approaching and that the pain she suffered will go away and she will come out fine, God willing. Interpretation of seeing all colors in a dream for a man if he sees A married man sees all colors in his dream, as this indicates achieving goals and achieving the ambitions that he wants to achieve. Also, seeing the colors of the spectrum in a dream indicates that the dreamer will join a new job, and it also indicates the collapse of his fears that he was facing. Also, seeing many colors In a merciful man’s dream, it indicates his marriage to a pious girl who obeys him and God Almighty. This vision shows many joys and happiness that he will encounter, and it also indicates great livelihood and abundance of lawful money, and God knows best. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team will Experts will reply to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing a lizard in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFans Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a lizard in a dream brings anxiety and stress to many, as most people are afraid of certain dreams and search for explanations because of their fear during the dream. Lizard in any form, kill it or run away. Interpretation of seeing a lizard in a dream: Seeing fog in a dream of responsibility, this indicates the presence of an evil person in a person’s life who is trying to harm him with his plans. Catching a lizard means overcoming the machinations of this evil man. If the dreamer sees that he has caught a lizard to eat it, This indicates that the plans of the evil person will be overturned and the opinion will be supported after the treacherous plan is implemented. And whoever sees that he is chasing a lizard in his house, this indicates that the person has been exposed in the house, and he is spreading word among relatives to cause discord and enmity between them. Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a lizard in a dreamIf he sees That person kills a lizard and those around him support him in this act, this indicates that he will save people from the oppressor who is eating their money. It also states that the dream of shooting a lizard secretly indicates that money is earned through illegal means. If someone dreams that a lizard attacked him then You put him in a self-defense situation, it means that the person will contract a disease and overcome it, praise be to God. Shooting a lizard in a dream is a sign of overcoming work problems created by evil people. Interpretation of escaping from a lizard in a dream for a single woman. If he sees a free girl, it indicates the presence of a lizard. She is being chased until someone is trying to lure her to harm her in the name of love. If a girl dreams that she was able to catch her, this indicates that she has already been injured physically or morally. If the girl is able to escape from the lizard that was chasing her in her dream, this indicates that she will discover his hatred and malevolence. Towards her. If a single girl dreams that she was running away from a lizard accompanied by someone, this is interpreted as the appearance in her life of someone who will take her away from the troublesome person. Or keep her away from the problems she faces in her life. Some scholars interpret that a single girl’s dream of a lizard is a sign of Chasing her evil friends. Interpretation of a dead lizard in a dream for a single woman. Dead lizard solution: It indicates the presence of a malicious person, but he has no plan to harm the dreamer. If an unmarried girl dreams of a dead lizard, this indicates that there is someone who hates her and envies her for her spite and malice, and is unable to harm her. If an unmarried girl sees a group of dead lizards in her dream, this means that she will achieve great success, but she will be surrounded by people who hate her success. A dreamy vision of a dead lizard for a single girl. This indicates an attempt at theft or fraud. Interpretation of seeing lizard eggs in a dream for a married woman. Seeing lizard eggs in a dream A married woman means that she will face a problem between her and her husband because an evil person has created a wedge between her and her husband. If a married woman sees a lizard entering the house, that is, the entry of a new person into his family, and it does not mean any property of the family or any of its members. Interpretation of seeing a lizard in a dream for a married woman. Dream of fog: To attend a party WeddingA dream that is not praiseworthy and does not portend misfortune

title: Interpretation of divorce in a dream, interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of divorce in a dream According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen, divorce means the end of marital life that may extend for years, which is a frightening and disturbing matter for the man or woman, especially if divorce appears in the dream. One of them was at a time when he was facing a lot of problems in his married life, and this could be a sign that they both want the divorce to happen in the end and that it is a relief for both parties, so in this article we will tell you the interpretation of seeing divorce in a dream, the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of the dream of seeing divorce in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing divorce in a dream as a symbol of separation, and separation between spouses is not required, because it could indicate leaving a job, a friend, or any other person. If the dreamer is single, then the dream of divorce indicates that he will get married soon. And God knows best. If a merchant sees that he is divorcing his wife in a dream, this portends the loss of his business, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream that he is divorcing his wife and in reality there are disagreements between them, then this dream indicates the reality of divorce. If a married man sees in a dream that he is divorcing his wife out of jealousy, This indicates the intensity of his love for her in reality. Whoever sees in a dream that he has divorced his wife three times, this indicates that this person will die soon, and God knows best. Divorce in a dream as a result of hatred, in reality, means that the dreamer has many disagreements and problems in his life. If someone is really sick and sees that he divorced his wife in a dream, this is his interpretation that he will recover from his illness. Interpretation of the dream of seeing divorce in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen presented Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of divorce in the following cases: Whoever sees in his dream that he is divorcing his wife and then deeply regrets it. This decision and he tries to return to her, this indicates the dreamer’s stability in his married life on earth, and also shows his happiness with his wife. Ibn Shaheen interpreted the vision of divorce in a dream in general as a sign of goodness and satisfaction that the dreamer will obtain, but in the event that there are no problems between him and His wife in reality. Whoever sees in a dream that he is divorcing his wife due to many arguments, this indicates that something bad will happen to the dreamer, which is leaving work or losing money. Whoever sees in his dream that he is divorcing his wife in his last divorce, this indicates that he will soon be divorced from work. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing divorce in a dream for a single woman: Whoever sees that she is divorced in her dream, and there are problems between her and her friends, this portends severing her relationship with them in reality. Seeing divorce in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she will leave her fiancé if she gets engaged, but if she does not Therefore, this is good to make her life better for the better. Divorce in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her engagement in the near future in reality, if she is satisfied with this decision in the dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing divorce for a married woman. Seeing divorce in a married woman’s dream indicates the end of problems between her and her. Her husband, in the event that there are problems in reality. Whoever sees in her dream that she is happy with the decision to divorce, this indicates that in reality she is in a new stage of her life.

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of a wound in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a wound during sleep The interpretation of dreams comes from what the thing that the dreamer sees indicates and what it shows, and the interpretation of seeing a wound depends on the location of the wound, the presence or absence of bleeding, and the feeling of pain. Or not, the interpretation of the dream of seeing a wound could be an indication of the problems, difficulties, and pain that the dreamer is suffering from, and it could be a sign of abundant sustenance and money, if the wound is on his hand. Interpretation of the wound in a dream The dream of seeing a wound is considered an annoying vision with unexpected interpretations, It is a sign of the amount of work, pain, and difficulties that the dreamer is going through. If a single girl sees that she is injured, this means that this girl is going through some difficult problems that cause her pain, and this sadness may be the result of a failure in an emotional relationship. If he sees that he has healed from the wound This is an indication that these problems will be solved by God’s will (glory be to Him) in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about an open wound: To dream of seeing an open wound in a dream for a married woman is considered a promising vision. If a married woman sees that she is injured, this means that God (Glory be to Him) will bless her with offspring. Valid sooner rather than later. If you see that she is injured, but without blood, this is an indication that this woman will live her life and her abundant money. What is the interpretation of the dream of a wound on the hand? The dream of seeing a wound on his hand in a dream is one of the promising visions, as if the dreamer sees a wound on his hand, It means that God (Glory be to Him) will provide for him. A person will have a lot of money and an abundance of livelihood, and in most cases this money and livelihood comes from his relatives. If an unmarried girl sees that she has a wound on her hand, this means that God (Glory be to Him) will bless her with a good husband of good morals in the near future. If a woman sees If a pregnant woman has a wound on her hand, this means that the time of her birth is approaching and that God (Glory be to Him) will facilitate her birth and she will give birth to her child safely. What is the interpretation of a dream about a wound on a hand without blood? A dream about a wound on a hand without blood is one of the most promising dreams. If a pregnant woman sees that she is injured, this is a sign that her due date is approaching and that she will give birth safely if the wound is without blood. However, if she is injured and blood oozes, this means that she will give birth by cesarean section, but there will be no danger to her and her newborn and she will soon recover from the pain. If an unmarried girl sees that she has a wound and that wound is without blood, this means that there is a good man with high morals who deserves to marry her and that God (Glory be to Him) will make it happen. Marriage is better than this good man, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the wound is on the right hand, then this livelihood and money will be provided by one of his male relatives. If the wound is on the left hand, this means that God (Glory be to Him) will grant him a lot of goodness and money through one of his female relatives. Interpretation of a dream about a hand injury Left with a knife

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing a dream of darkness in a dream

preview.html: What you do not know about the presence of darkness in a dream: Darkness is a place where there is no lighting and black remains the dominant color. When a dreamer dreams of darkness in a dream, he begins to wonder and search for an explanation, why many people are afraid of darkness in a dream, and indeed also, their heart or Their minds are at peace until they know the interpretation completely. Darkness in a dream The interpretation of a dream about darkness in a dream means that the dreamer is doing a lot of strange or inappropriate behavior and needs to pay attention to it and take care of himself so that he does not do it. If the dreamer dreams that he is in a very dark place, and he cannot get out of it, In his sleep, he felt pain and a state of panic and horror that befell him as a result of this darkness. The interpretation of the dream shows the dreamer’s confusion in life and his inability to coexist with his painful circumstances, knowing that he cannot cope with the pressures that these circumstances may soon cause him. If the dreamer In a very dark place and he kept looking for a ray of light until he found it and followed that light in his sleep so that he could get rid of the distress that was inside him, the dream shows that the dreamer will throw himself into a huge disaster and he will continue to search for a way out of it and he will be able to find it. Seeing darkness in a dream for a virgin girl means that she will fall into many experiences that she never expected and she does not think that all these tragedies will be her share, and that her fear of this darkness is interpreted as meaning that she will be greatly overwhelmed. The shock when surrounded by these crises. When a man sees in his dream that he is lost in a place that he knows nothing about, and that place was dangerous and the specter of darkness was controlling him from all sides, and the dream was completed that he continued to walk on this path without this dream, it is a vision that is not benign, because He explains that immorality attracts the viewer. On the other hand, he could not restrain his desires and unfortunately he will find himself in a spiral of disobedience and follow the wrong path. Interpretation of a dream about darkness on the road Imam Al-Sadiq confirmed that if the dreamer sees that he is in a street empty of people and dark and he walks on it without turning back, then this vision indicates... He will be very sad when he loses one of the people dear to his heart, and the dream means that this loss may be due to the migration of that dear person from the country and leaving the dreamer alone, sad and lonely. Despair is one of the meanings of the dreamer’s vision that he is walking in the dark without fear, and jurists have explained another indication that it is Walking on a dark road means that the dreamer will cut off a loved one and the period of interruption and strife between them will increase. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is walking on a black and dark road, and when he walked on it a faint light appeared to him, and because of this light the features of the road became clear to the dreamer. But God has written salvation for him, and immediately the dreamer’s heart will be filled with hope and optimism again. Interpretation of a dream of darkness in the house. The jurists explained that if the dreamer sees darkness in his dream, the dream will be interpreted in four interpretations. The first interpretation is that he feels that his future is lost and there are no clear traits for him to follow until he succeeds. Like many people. The second explanation: If she was alive
